title: While U.S. Focuses On Sony Hack, Some Of The World Is In The Dark
teaser: The controversy around The Interview is a top story in the U.S., but those in North Korea have no knowledge of the film. NPR's Arun Rath talks with Washington Post Tokyo bureau chief Anna Fifield.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
